title: Pill
description: A flexible badge component designed for a variety of use cases.

<script lang="ts">
    import { Badge } from "$lib/components/ui/badge";
    import { cn } from "$UTILS$.js";
    import type { ComponentProps } from "svelte";

    let {
        ref = $bindable(null),
        variant = "secondary",
        themed = false,
        class: className,
        children,   
        ...restProps
    }: ComponentProps<typeof Badge> & {
        themed?: boolean;
    } = $props();
</script>

<Badge
    bind:ref
    class={cn("gap-2 rounded-full px-3 py-1.5 font-normal", className)}
    {variant}
    {...restProps}
>
    {@render children?.()}
</Badge>

<script lang="ts">
    import * as Avatar from "$lib/components/ui/avatar";
    import { cn } from "$UTILS$.js";
    import type { ComponentProps } from "svelte";

    let {
        ref = $bindable(null),
        fallback,
        class: className,
        children,   
        ...restProps
    }: ComponentProps<typeof Avatar.Image> & {
        fallback?: string;
    } = $props();
</script>

<Avatar.Root 
    bind:ref 
    class={cn("-ml-1 h-4 w-4", className)}
>
    <Avatar.Image {...restProps} />
    <Avatar.Fallback>{fallback}</Avatar.Fallback>
</Avatar.Root>
*:not(:first-of-type)]:[mask-image:radial-gradient(circle_9px_at_-4px_50%,transparent_99%,white_100%)]", className )} {...restProps} > {@render children?.()}

<script lang="ts">
    import { Button } from "$lib/components/ui/button";
    import { cn } from "$UTILS$.js";
    import type { ComponentProps } from "svelte";

    let {
        ref = $bindable(null),
        class: className,
        children,   
        ...restProps
    }: ComponentProps<typeof Button> = $props();
</script>

<Button
    bind:ref
    class={cn(
        "-my-2 -mr-2 size-6 rounded-full p-0.5 hover:bg-foreground/5",
        className
    )}
    size="icon"
    variant="ghost"
    {...restProps}
>
    {@render children?.()}
</Button>

<script lang="ts">
    import { cn } from "$UTILS$.js";
    import { Minus, ChevronUp, ChevronDown } from "@lucide/svelte";

    let {
        delta,
        class: className,
    }: {
        delta: number;
        class?: string;
    } = $props();
</script>

{#if !delta}
    <Minus class={cn("size-3 text-muted-foreground", className)} />
{:else if delta > 0}
    <ChevronUp class={cn("size-3 text-emerald-500", className)} />
{:else}
    <ChevronDown class={cn("size-3 text-rose-500", className)} />
{/if}

<script lang="ts">
    import { cn } from "$UTILS$.js";
    import type { Icon as LucideIcon } from "@lucide/svelte";
    import type { ComponentProps } from "svelte";

    let {
        class: className,
        icon: Icon,
        ...restProps
    }: ComponentProps<typeof LucideIcon> & {
        icon: typeof LucideIcon;
    } = $props();
</script>

<Icon
    className={cn("size-3 text-muted-foreground", className)}
    size={12}
    {...restProps}
/>
{#if pulse} {/if}
{@render children?.()}
